Package edu.udo.cs.wvtool.generic.wordfilter

Provides classes and interfaces for the filtering of words.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
WVTWordFilter This interface represents a mechanism by which tokens (words) are filtered from a stream of tokens.
 

Class Summary
AbstractStopWordFilter Abstract call implementing basic functionality for several word filters.
CombinedWordFilter A word filter that combines several word filters by disjunction.
DummyWordFilter Dummy Wrapper for the stop word class (without performing any filtering).
SelectingWordFilter Class that dynamically selects the word filter according to the selected language.
StopWordFilterFile Filters all words specified in a file.
StopWordsWrapper Wrapper for the stop word class.
StopWordsWrapperGerman A wrapper for the german stopwordlist
 

Package edu.udo.cs.wvtool.generic.wordfilter Description

Provides classes and interfaces for the filtering of words.
